title: Watch Nishikori vs. Nardi on Challenger TV
description: Kei Nishikori will make his Arizona Tennis Classic debut Wednesday evening against Italian Luca Nardi. The No. 76 player in the PIF ATP Rankings defeated Nardi just four months ago in the Helsinki Challenger championship match to claim his eighth trophy at that level. Nishikori and Nardi are in a stacked Phoenix draw, which includes #NextGenATP Joao Fonseca, Nuno Borges, Flavio Cobolli, Jan-Lennard Struff and more. Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost. Watch Kei Nishikori vs. Luca Nardi (not before 7 p.m. local time)

html:
Challenger

Former World No. 4 and Italian play Wednesday evening local time

March 12, 2025

ImagenShop Agencia Fotográfica/ATC

Kei Nishikori practises at the Arizona Tennis Classic. By ATP Staff

Kei Nishikori will make his Arizona Tennis Classic debut Wednesday evening against Italian Luca Nardi.

The No. 76 player in the PIF ATP Rankings defeated Nardi just four months ago in the Helsinki Challenger championship match to claim his eighth trophy at that level. Nishikori and Nardi are in a stacked Phoenix draw, which includes #NextGenATP Joao Fonseca, Nuno Borges, Flavio Cobolli, Jan-Lennard Struff and more.

Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost.

Watch Kei Nishikori vs. Luca Nardi (not before 7 p.m. local time)
